name: UpdateMileage
description: Use this endpoint to update a single Mileage entry.

date.description:
The date of the project mileage entry

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false
date.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

distance.description:
The distance amount that the mileage registration should contain

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

employeeNumber.description:
The employee number of the project mileage entry

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false
employeeNumber.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

from.description:
The starting place of the travel which the mileage registration reflects

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

includeApprove.description:
By default it is true, so a user with rights will be able to approve. Once it is approved, field becomes false and it will be impossible to approve ever again.

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false
includeApprove.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

isApproved.description:
Value specifying if the mileage was approved. If it was approved, it can not be updated anymore.

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false
isApproved.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

number.description:
The unique number of the project mileage entry

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true
number.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

objectVersion.description:
The object version, required for PUT requests.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

projectNumber.description:
The project number of the project mileage entry

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false
projectNumber.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

to.description:
The destination of the travel which the mileage registration reflects

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false
